mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `lcap_role_per_mapping_f803ac` INNER JOIN `lcap_permission_f803ac` ON `lcap_role_per_mapping_f803ac`.`permission_id` = `lcap_permission_f803ac`.`id` INNER JOIN `lcap_per_res_mapping_f803ac` ON `lcap_permission_f803ac`.`id` = `lcap_per_res_mapping_f803ac`.`permission_id` INNER JOIN `lcap_resource_f803ac` ON `lcap_per_res_mapping_f803ac`.`resource_id` = `lcap_resource_f803ac`.`id`
`lcap_role_per_mapping_f803ac`.`role_id` = #{roleId}
